Package com.coldline.src.uihandler

package com.coldline.src.uihandler
  • Class
    Description
    BaseRequirements
    sets the bounds of the base jframe which implements FrameGetter
    ButtonGetter
    creates interface ButtonGetter.
    ButtonPropertiesGetter
    interface ButtonPropertiesGetter
    CenterText
    creates interface CenterText
    CreateBigFontLabel
    UI blueprint for big fonts splash texts inherits methods and variables from CreateJLabel and SetComponentFont
    CreateJButton
    blueprint for button creation extends BaseRequirements and implements ButtonGetter
    CreateJFrame
    creates the window
    CreateJLabel
    used to display texts
    CreateMediumFontLabel
    for medium sized fonts
    CreateNormalButton
    creates a normal button
    CreateSmallFontLabel
    creates a small font label
    CreateTextField
    creates text field to receive inputs from buttons
    DisableButton
    interface for singular button disabling
    DisableMultipleButtons
    interface for multiple button disabling
    FrameCloser
    interface for frame closing
    FrameGetter
    interface for JFrame
    FrameInitializer
    interface for fram initialization
    GroupDisable
    group disable change of states
    InitializeButtons
    interface for subclasses which deal with button initialization
    MultipleButtonClickable
    interface for enabling and clickable buttons
    ObjectMovable
    interface for movable objects
    SetBackground
    background ui interface
    SetComponentColor
    interface for component color
    SetComponentFont
    blueprint for the font appearance
    SingleButtonClickable
    interface for clickable single buttons
    TextFieldGetter
    interface creation
    TextSetter
    sets text interface
